Package com.intellij.vcs.log

Class VcsCommitStyleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.vcs.log.VcsCommitStyleFactory

  • public class VcsCommitStyleFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for creating instances of default implementation VcsCommitStyle.

      • combine

        public static VcsLogHighlighter.VcsCommitStyle combine(java.util.Collection<? extends VcsLogHighlighter.VcsCommitStyle> styles)
        Combines a list of styles into one. For example, if first style in the list specifies text color but does not provide background color and second style in the list does have a background color then this method will return a style with text color from the first and background color from the second. However if the first style in the list has all the attributes then the result will be equal to the first style and the rest of the list will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        styles - list of styles to combine into one.
        Returns:
        a combination of styles from the list.
